Name: Kentucky Colonel No. 2
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of peach slice & mint sprig.
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Peach and bourbon with hints of orange and spice.
History: Created by Morgan Watson of Apartment, Belfast, Northern Ireland.
Nutrition: One serving of Kentucky Colonel No. 2 contains 218 calories
